name: The Square Root - by Starfell
description:
The Square Root: Submission for GGJ 2023 by team Starfell

Created by:  Alexis Giaque (programmer), Edgar Angeles (programmer),  Takaaki Hara (art), Rashel Li (UI/UX),  Olivia Zhang (producer), and  Andrew Lee (scriptwriter).

The Square Root is a story-centered rpg where the player is a chef who runs a space-diner. They buy ingredients and prepare dishes according to the different customers, and  along the way they learn the story of special characters and unlock different ingredients.
